segments.advisor_message: So, uh, tell me about your, like, job or what you do for a living? Any, um, income sources you wanna mention?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I work at a, uh, tech company, you know? Uh, my salary is, like, around fifty thousand, wait, I mean, fifty-five thousand a year, before taxes, but, um, I get paid, like, every month.

segments.advisor_message: Okay, that’s cool! And, uh, is this the only income you have?
segments.client_message: Oh! No, no, I also, um, I rent out a room, like, on the side? It brings in, um, around six hundred a month, gross. So yeah, I guess that helps a bit too, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Right, so both monthly then? Any, uh, extra notes about the rental?
segments.client_message: Hmm, well, the tenants change sometimes, but, uh, I have a contract for, like, a year, I think? Just, ya know, typical rental stuff.
